settings.label: Login Main Description
settings.default: Log in or create an account so you can create registries, share them with people, track your gifts, and more.

settings.label: How To Description Text
settings.default: Create a gift registry for any event and share it with your friends and family to get the gifts you actually want. You can also track all purchases from the registry and thank gifters when you receive a gift.

settings.label: Step 1 title Text
settings.default: Create a registry and fill out the required fields.

settings.label: Step 2 title Text
settings.default: Add products to your gift registry by clicking the 'Add to Registry' button in any product page.

settings.label: Step 3 title Text
settings.default: Share the registry link with your friends and family.
